queries.query: select s.*,sxs.titulo,sxs.slogan from sedes s inner join sloganxsede sxs on sxs.idsede = s.idsedes where s.sede=:sede
select s.*,sxs.titulo,sxs.slogan from sedes s inner join sloganxsede sxs on sxs.idsede = s.idsedes
select titulo,slogan from sloganxsede where idsede = :idsede
select sed.idsedes as id,sed.sede as label from sedes sed inner join userxsede uxs on uxs.idsede = sed.idsedes inner join users us on us.cedula = uxs.iduser where us.username=:username
